programming.question: What is an Alogrithm?
programming.answer: A set of ordered and finite steps used to solve a given problem

programming.question: Define AJAX
programming.answer: Used to retrieve and process information without needing to reload the browser

programming.question: Define JSON
programming.answer: Converts any javascript object into text and vice versa, allowing communication between browser and server

programming.question: Define the DOM in HTML/CSS
programming.answer: Defines the logical structure of documents and the way a document is accessed and manipulated

programming.question: Define ASP.Net
programming.answer: A program which allow you to create dynamic website using the .Net framework

programming.question: Describe the function of the HTML, CSS and Javascript in front end programming
programming.answer: Adds content to the website, styles the content and adds functionality to the content

programming.question: Define Progressive Enchancement
programming.answer: Layering technologies sequentially so that they work without reliance upon each other

programming.question: Define a variable
programming.answer: Stores information in a memory address to be referenced and manipulated in a computer program
